triggeredEntityDefinition.name: Business Transaction response time is much higher than normal

0.description:
AppDynamics has detected a problem with Business Transaction HomepageEnglish.
Business Transaction response time is much higher than normal continues to violate with warning.
All of the following conditions were found to be violating
For Application de-Production:
1) Average Response Time (ms) Baseline Condition
Average Response Time (ms)'s value 672.00 was greater than baseline-based calculated value 233.00 by 2.00 standard deviation(s) 198.95. Baseline used here is 'Daily Trend - Last 30 days' for the last 5 minutes

triggeredEntityDefinition.name: *Error Rate at 1.0% or higher, 03% is the normal

1.description:

*Error Rate at 1.0% or higher, 03% is the normal downgraded in severity and is now warning.
